      • loadSGVObject

        static GuestVendasInterface loadSGVObject​(java.lang.String objectPath)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads a SGV object from the given path
        Parameters:
        objectPath - path were the object file is stored to be loaded
        Returns:
        SGV object that was stored in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case there's a problem reading the object file
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case the file does not contain the correct class

      • salesByMonth

        Query2Pair salesByMonth​(int month)
        Given a month, returns the number of sales in that month and the number of distinct clients who did buy.
        Parameters:
        month - month to filter by
        Returns:
        Pair containig the number of sales in that month and the number of distinct clients who did buy.

                        int branch)
        Version that accepts a branch aswell
        Parameters:
        month - month to filter by
        branch - branch to filter by
        Returns:
        Pair containig the number of sales in that month and the number of distinct clients who did buy.

                                                                                                               int limite)
        Query 9 Given a products's ID returns the N biggest buyers
        Returns:
        Map containing the products the client most bought, by descending order. Each product is accompanied by the amount that client spent.
